caption.p: Panel A: Illustration of PVA/10CH/5Carv/3CNC formulation ( a); and UV-Vis curves of PVA formulations ( b) [ 286]. Panel B: Antibacterial study of PVA, PVA/CH, and PVA/CH/LNP nanocomposites, on the increase of plant pathogenic bacteria Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. odoriferum (Pco) (CFBP 1115) 1 × 10 6 CFU/mL ( a); and Xanthomonas arboricola pv. pruni (Xap) (CFBP 3894) 1 × 10 6 CFU/mL ( b) [ 48]. Panel C: Antioxidant properties migrating substances of PVA/CH/LNP nanocomposites immersed in methanol solution for 24 h, measuring the absorbance level at 517 nm ( a); and colorimetric deviation of the DPPH methanolic solution ( b) [ 48].
